Projects


  1. Pairs Trading

    • Implemented pairs trading strategy in python using a top-down approach; developed the strategy with optimal entry and exit points and applied to out-of-sample period.
    • Achieved a Sharpe ratio of 2.23; also computed cumulative PnL and max drawdown of the strategy.

  2. Portfolio Optimization

    • Built a custom RL environment in Python for asset allocation of DJI constituents; conducted analysis during bull and bear market periods and compared the results with performance of DJI and traditional optimization methods.
    • Achieved a CAGR of 24.5% and sharpe ratio of 2.17 with RL model, compared to DJIâ€™s CAGR of 13.57% and sharpe ratio of 1.15.

  3. Option Pricing

    • Developed an application in C++ using OOPS concepts to price European, American, Asian and Basket options using finite difference, monte carlo simulation and numerical integration methods.
    • Used control variate technique to compute greeks of the options and to reduce the standard errors of their estimated prices.

  4. Yield Curve Bootstrapping

    • Computed all the coupon payment dates, accrued interest and invoice prices of the reported US Treasury notes and bonds in Excel.
    • Built an optimized zero-coupon bond term structure using regression.
